column5: Driving down my road this morning coming back from town and it was snowing like crazy and I come across a ghostly figure ahead of me.  Turns out it was a beautiful doe out for an early morning stroll enjoying the scenery so I took her picture.
Lew, She might be looking for you to tell you that the back yard feeder needs re-filling.
Some would say, yer an ass man Lew. LOL  Very nice. You have great company.
Down here the deer CROSS the road it appears up North they USE the road. Nice picture for sure.  Art
65 and rain today here, deer would need goulashes!
